DOC.detailed_description: Only eligible patient willingness join study include . Eligible patient age 18-65 year either sex , American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) physical status I & II , body mass index ( BMI ) 16-35 . The exclusion criterion patient allergic pregabalin , impaired hepatic renal function , alcohol substance abuse , chronic pain ( except pain knee joint ) daily intake analgesic , uncontrolled medical disease ( hypertension diabetes mellitus ) inability operate patient-controlled analgesia ( PCA ) device . Data analysis - Student t-test continuous data normal distribution - Mann-Whitney U test continuous data non-normal distribution - Chi-square test categorical data
